title: Sonic Alert 0 Sonic Bomb Extra Dual Alarm Clock with Large Display-SBD375SS, Silver
features: Made in the USA or Imported
EXTRA-LOUD dual alarm with volume control

description: The perfect couple's alarm clock, the SBD375ss dual alarm allows for two different alarm times to accommodate two people. It also features an easy-to-read large (1.8") display, our most powerful bed shaker, 5-level dimmer function and a convenient test mode to ensure your clock is setup properly. Sleep well knowing you'll wake up on time.
